item.title: Polkadot Establishes Capital Markets Division: Polkadot Capital Group
item.description: On August 20th, according to a report by Cointelegraph, Polkadot has set up the Polkadot Capital Group, which is a capital markets division intended to connect traditional finance with its blockchain ecosystem.Its objective is to link traditional finance with the Polkadot infrastructure, assisting institutions in exploring opportunities in asset management, banking, venture capital, trading platforms, and over-the-counter trading.This division will also place emphasis on demonstrating the practical applications of decentralized finance, staking, and the tokenization of rapidly expanding real-world assets (RWA).

item.title: Robinhood is partnering with Kalshi to launch NFL and college football prediction markets.
item.description: On August 20th, as per CoinDesk, Robinhood has entered into a partnership with the blockchain prediction market platform Kalshi, which is regulated by the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC). This allows users to engage in trading on the outcomes of NFL and college football games. The prediction market will be made available through Robinhood's Prediction Market Center, and U.S. users will be able to access this service via Kalshi's trading platform.

item.title: SharpLink: Increased Ethereum Holding Immediately Staked in Full, Resulting in 1388 ETH Rewards
item.description: On August 20th, the officials of SharpLink declared that since the implementation of the Ethereum Treasury strategy, they have obtained 1388 ETH (approximately $6 million) in staking rewards. SharpLink purchases ETH nearly every day and promptly stakes all of it.

item.title: Three new addresses bought a total of 52,475 ETH, equivalent to around 220 million US dollars.
item.description: August 19th. Based on the monitoring of Onchain Lens, within the past 20 minutes, three newly established wallets received 52,475 ETH from BitGo. The value of these ETH is approximately $220.44 million and they are likely to be related to BitMine.

item.title: Billionaire Chamath Palihapitiya's SPAC Company AEXA Plans to IPO on the NYSE
item.description: On August 19th, as per CoinDesk, the prominent Silicon Valley venture capitalist and billionaire Chamath Palihapitiya launched a Special Purpose Acquisition Company (SPAC) named American Exceptionalism Acquisition Corp (AEXA), with the intention of conducting a $250 million initial public offering (IPO) on the New York Stock Exchange.

item.title: Coinbase to List USELESS Spot Trading
item.description: August 19th. As per an official announcement, Coinbase is going to list the spot trading of the "USELESS" (or whatever "USELESS" refers to in this context).

item.title: 「Big Brother Ma」 Huang Li Cheng's Multi-Long Positions Face Unrealized Losses Exceeding $10 Million
item.description: August 19th. As per on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licheng currently holds long positions in BTC, ETH, HYPE, and PUMP, with a total unrealized loss of 10.35 million US dollars.Currently, the liquidation price of his ETH long position is $3081, and he has adjusted the take-profit and stop-loss range to between $4242 and $4800.

item.title: Two institution-associated addresses bought a total of 9,044 ETH, approximately $38 million.
item.description: On August 19th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, despite the downturn in the market, institutions are still actively purchasing ETH.Twenty-five minutes ago, two wallet addresses related to institutions received 9044 ETH (approximately $38 million) from FalconX.

item.title: The crypto market is experiencing a widespread decline, with a total of $291 million in long liquidations across the network in the past 24 hours.
item.description: On August 19th, according to CoinGecko data, the cryptocurrency market is experiencing a general decline today. The total market capitalization has dropped to $3.916 trillion, with a 24-hour decrease of 1.5%.Coinglass data indicates that in the past 24 hours, there have been liquidations amounting to $378 million across the entire network. The long liquidations are $291 million, and the short liquidations are $86.48 million.

item.title: The Whale Long Position of "Longing ETH with 125k USD Leveraged Position" Liquidated with Only $10 Remaining Space
item.description: On August 19th, as per on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the "125k USD Long ETH Liquidation" whale has decreased its position by 5634.08 ETH at two addresses and incurred a loss of 830k USD. Today, it has been forced to liquidate an additional 11,585.13 ETH, and the latest liquidation price is 4159 USD.According to HTX market data, Ethereum once dropped to 4169.42 USD and is now rebounding above 4200 USD, with a 24-hour decline of 2.37%.
